title: 服务器运行中突然无法连接
author: gsjxg
txt_content:
服务器运行一段时间后会出现无法访问情况
后台日志一直循环这一段，但是没崩溃，可以正常操作，服务端是1.12.2的CatServer，有没有大佬知道怎么解决
[12:54:23] [Netty Server IO #0/WARN] [io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline]: An exceptionCaught() event was fired, and it reached at the tail of the pipeline. It usually means the last handler in the pipeline did not handle the exception.
java.io.IOException: 提供了一个无效的参数。
